articles.title: No Time to Die: lifesaver hunt after man's Sheffield cinema heart attack watching James Bond film - The Star
articles.description: The family of a man who went into cardiac arrest at a Sheffield cinema are appealing to find the four audience members who saved his life so that they can say thank you.
articles.content:
Malcolm Clarke, 81, went into cardiac arrest at the Odeon cinema at Arundel Gate on Saturday October 2 during a screening of the new James Bond film, No Time To Die.
